programs.name: Automotive Technology
programs.description: Short technical certificate preparing learners for entry-level automotive service and repair roles.

careers.title: Automotive Service Technician

competencies.description: Diagnosing and repairing various engine systems.
Inspecting, maintaining, and repairing braking mechanisms.
Using modern diagnostic tools to troubleshoot vehicle issues.

careers.description: Performs routine maintenance and repair on cars and light trucks.

careers.title: Tire and Alignment Specialist

competencies.description: Installing and balancing tires for different vehicles.
Performing wheel alignment for safety and efficiency.

Testing and replacing batteries and related components.

competencies.description: Communicating with clients to explain needed repairs and services.

careers.title: Auto Body Technician

competencies.description: Applying paint and finishes to repaired surfaces.

competencies.description: Inspecting vehicles for compliance with safety standards.

competencies.description: Managing automotive parts inventory and ordering.

competencies.description: Familiarity with standard automotive tools and equipment.

programs.name: Biology
programs.description: Bachelor's in biology covering genetics, ecology, molecular biology, and laboratory techniques.

careers.title: Research Biologist

competencies.description: Conducting experiments and using lab equipment safely.
Analyzing biological data and interpreting results.
Understanding DNA, RNA, and protein processes.
Studying interactions between organisms and environments.
Collecting samples and conducting experiments in the field.
Using microscopes for cell and tissue analysis.
Designing experiments to answer research questions.

careers.description: Conducts biological research in labs or field settings to advance scientific knowledge.

careers.title: Environmental Consultant

competencies.description: Ensuring projects meet environmental laws and standards.
Using geographic tools to analyze environmental data.
Collecting soil, water, and biological samples.
Explaining findings to clients and stakeholders.

careers.description: Provides guidance on environmental compliance and sustainable practices for businesses.

careers.title: Laboratory Technician

competencies.description: Following safety protocols for handling chemicals and biological materials.
Preparing samples for experiments and tests.

competencies.description: Applying PCR, gel electrophoresis, and cloning techniques.

Choosing materials for performance and cost-efficiency.
Maintaining records of designs and specifications.
Developing creative solutions for new products.

careers.description: Develops and improves mechanical products, ensuring performance and manufacturability.

programs.name: Nursing
programs.description: Undergraduate program preparing students to provide patient care, health education, and clinical support in healthcare settings.

careers.title: Registered Nurse (RN)

competencies.description: Effectively interacting with patients and healthcare teams.
Making quick decisions in clinical scenarios.
Following protocols to prevent spread of infections.
Adhering to ethical and legal standards in healthcare.

careers.description: Provides direct patient care and supports healthcare teams in various medical settings.

careers.title: Nurse Practitioner (NP)

competencies.description: Providing health advice and education to patients.
Working with physicians and healthcare teams.
Adhering to ethical standards in advanced nursing practice.
Applying evidence-based research to patient care.

careers.description: Provides advanced clinical care, diagnosis, and treatment, often with prescriptive authority.

careers.title: Clinical Nurse Specialist

competencies.description: Guiding and training other nursing staff.
Working with medical teams for patient outcomes.

careers.description: Specializes in complex patient care, mentoring, and clinical expertise within healthcare settings.

careers.title: Public Health Nurse

competencies.description: Assessing and promoting health in populations.
Educating communities on wellness and disease prevention.
Working with public health organizations and teams.
Understanding public health policies and regulations.
Adhering to public health ethical standards.

careers.description: Promotes and manages health programs at the community level, focusing on prevention and education.

careers.title: Pediatric Nurse

competencies.description: Providing care for infants, children, and adolescents.
Monitoring child growth and health conditions.
Safely giving medications to pediatric patients.
Teaching parents and families about child care.
Working with pediatricians and healthcare teams.
Making quick decisions in pediatric care.
Communicating effectively with children and families.
Providing care aligned with pediatric ethical standards.

careers.description: Provides specialized nursing care for children and supports families in healthcare settings.

careers.title: Geriatric Nurse

competencies.description: Monitoring chronic conditions and aging-related issues.
Teaching elderly patients about self-care and wellness.
Working with geriatricians and healthcare teams.
Engaging with patients and families effectively.
Ensuring care respects patient dignity and ethics.
Making informed clinical decisions for elderly patients.

careers.description: Provides nursing care tailored to the health and wellness of older adults.

careers.title: Emergency Room Nurse

competencies.description: Providing immediate care to critical patients.
Making quick decisions in high-pressure scenarios.
Coordinating with ER teams and specialists.
Working with physicians, techs, and support staff.
Providing care that adheres to ER ethical standards.
Ensuring patient needs and rights are addressed.

careers.description: Delivers urgent and critical care to patients in emergency medical settings.

careers.title: Nurse Educator

competencies.description: Supervising practical training in clinical settings.
Assessing student performance and learning outcomes.
Continuously improving teaching and nursing skills.

careers.description: Educates and mentors nursing students and staff while integrating clinical practice and research.

careers.title: Critical Care Nurse

competencies.description: Caring for critically ill patients in intensive care units.
Using specialized equipment to track patient health.
Making rapid clinical decisions under pressure.
Coordinating with physicians and critical care teams.
Adhering to ethical standards in critical care.
Ensuring patient rights and needs are met.

careers.description: Provides specialized care to critically ill patients in ICU and high-dependency settings.

programs.name: Psychology
programs.description: Undergraduate program studying human behavior, mental processes, and psychological research to understand and improve mental health.

careers.title: Clinical Psychologist

competencies.description: Working with medical and mental health teams.

careers.description: Diagnoses and treats mental health disorders using therapy and psychological techniques.

careers.title: Counseling Psychologist

competencies.description: Building trust and rapport with clients.
Using psychological research to inform practice.
Working with healthcare and educational professionals.

careers.description: Provides therapy and guidance to individuals and groups for mental health and wellness.

careers.title: Industrial-Organizational Psychologist

competencies.description: Using research and statistics to improve processes.
Ensuring fair and ethical workplace solutions.
Conducting studies to inform HR practices.

careers.description: Applies psychology to workplace settings to improve employee performance and organizational efficiency.

careers.title: School Psychologist

competencies.description: Providing guidance to students and families.
Working with teachers, parents, and administrators.
Maintaining student records and progress notes.
Effectively interacting with students and staff.
Following legal and ethical guidelines in schools.
Addressing student academic and social issues.
Using educational research to guide interventions.

careers.description: Supports student mental health and learning through assessments, counseling, and interventions in schools.

careers.title: Forensic Psychologist

competencies.description: Studying behavior to assist legal investigations.
Adhering to professional and legal ethics.
Explaining findings to legal teams and courts.
Working with law enforcement and attorneys.

careers.description: Applies psychology to legal contexts, including criminal investigations and courtroom evaluations.

careers.title: Health Psychologist

competencies.description: Using scientific findings in healthcare settings.
Following ethical guidelines in health psychology.

careers.description: Focuses on the psychological factors affecting physical health and develops strategies to improve wellness.

careers.title: Neuropsychologist

competencies.description: Testing brain function and cognitive abilities.
Providing interventions for cognitive or behavioral issues.
Explaining findings to patients and healthcare teams.
Working with medical professionals and families.

careers.title: Sports Psychologist

competencies.description: Providing mental health support to athletes.
Applying sports psychology studies to training.
Maintaining confidentiality and ethics in sports settings.
Working with coaches, trainers, and medical staff.

careers.description: Works with athletes to enhance performance, mental resilience, and well-being through psychological strategies.

Processing raw data to prepare for analysis.
Using platforms like Spark or Hadoop for large datasets.
Presenting findings to technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Solving complex business and technical challenges.

careers.description: Builds predictive models, analyzes data, and translates insights into actionable business recommendations.

Managing model lifecycle and continuous integration.

Using AWS, GCP, or Azure for ML deployments.
Constructing pipelines to support model workflows.
Solving technical challenges in ML deployment.

careers.description: Productionizes ML models and builds scalable ML systems for real-world applications.
